data.title: All: CHIPOLA CLASS OF 2024 GRADUATES
data.text:
MARIANNAâSome 509 students were eligible for graduation at Chipola College at the end of the spring semester. The Chipola College commencement ceremony was held on Thursday, May 2, at 7 p.m. in the Dothan Civic Center.

Counted as members of the class are all who completed their degrees or vocational certificates from December of 2023 to May of 2024 or who will complete work at Chipola during the Summer of 2024.

The class includes the following, listed according to type of degree and hometown:
